entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with rain beginning early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
